nodes.text: A tensor field was a form of electromagnetic field. Imperial All Terrain Armored Cargo Transport walkers utilized waveguided tensor fields in the joints of their legs to keep their overstressed motive assemblies in smooth alignment.

Tensor fields were also utilized on Providence-class Dreadnoughts, such as the flagship of the Confederacy navy, the Invisible Hand. During the battle of Coruscant the starship lost it's tensor fields to pressure from Coruscant's gravity well, and broke in half and started to fall to the planet below.
